damageable_zone_name.description: [string]Name of the damageable zone these settings apply to. Default damageable zone should be 'default', empty means unused.!

effect_node_name.description: [string]Name of the node we play status effect VFX and audio on when this zone is hit.

susceptibilities.description: List of status effect types this damageable zone may receive, and their thresholds.
